org.opentosca.toscana.plugins.kubernetes.docker.dockerfile.builder

Class DockerfileBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentosca.toscana.plugins.kubernetes.docker.dockerfile.builder.DockerfileBuilder

  • public class DockerfileBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows the building of a dockerfile.

    To implement the functionality the class stores the commands called and builds a Dockerfile out of them. (similar to StringBuilder)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Create a new instance of the DockerfileBuilder

    • Constructor Detail

      • DockerfileBuilder

        public DockerfileBuilder(java.lang.String baseImage,
                         java.lang.String workingDir,
                         PluginFileAccess fileAccess)
        Create a new instance of the DockerfileBuilder
        Parameters:
        baseImage - the "url" to the base image to use in this dockerfile
        workingDir - the working directory (relative to transformation root)
        fileAccess - the fileAccess to allow the writing of files

    • Method Detail

      • copyFromCsar

        public DockerfileBuilder copyFromCsar(java.lang.String inputPath,
                                      java.lang.String workdirName,
                                      java.lang.String fileName)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Copies a File or directory from the Csar Directory to the Working Directory of the dockerfile builder.

        After that the file gets added to the Container image using the COPY command.

        Parameters:
        inputPath - The relative input path from within the CSAR (can be a file or a directory
        workdirName - The name of the folder in witch the contents should be stored
        fileName - the path at witch the files should be inserted in the container image (use . to insert at the working directory)
        Returns:
        the object itself to allow chaining (not needed though).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - gets thrown if the coping fails (passed through from the copy method of the PluginFileAccess)

      • copyFromWorkingDir

        public DockerfileBuilder copyFromWorkingDir(java.lang.String inputPath,
                                            java.lang.String containerPath)
        Adds a COPY command to the dockerfile that should copy the input path (should be relative to the dockerfile working directory) to the specified container path
        Parameters:
        inputPath - the input path to copy (relative to dockerfile workingdir)
        containerPath - the path within the container (. for the current directory)
        Returns:
        the object itself to allow chaining (not needed though).

      • run

        public DockerfileBuilder run(java.lang.String command)
        Adds a RUN command to the dockerfile. This is considered just like a regular bash script.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to add to the dockerfile
        Returns:
        the object itself to allow chaining (not needed though).

      • entrypoint

        public DockerfileBuilder entrypoint(java.lang.String... args)
        Adds a ENTRYPOINT command to the Dockerfile
        Parameters:
        args - If only one command is given ENTRYPOINT will be added to the dockerfile otherwise ENTRYPOINT ["",""...] will be added otherwise
        Returns:
        the object itself to allow chaining (not needed though).

      • expose

        public DockerfileBuilder expose(int port)
        Adds a EXPOSE command for the given port to the dockerfile
        Parameters:
        port - The port to expose
        Returns:
        the object itself to allow chaining (not needed though).

      • volume

        public DockerfileBuilder volume(java.lang.String path)
        Adds a VOLUME command for the given path to the dockerfile
        Parameters:
        path - the path at wich the volume should be created within the Container Image
        Returns:
        the object itself to allow chaining (not needed though).

      • workdir

        public DockerfileBuilder workdir(java.lang.String directory)
        Adds a WORKDIR command for the given path to the dockerfile
        Parameters:
        directory - the path at wich the working directory should be set within the Container Image
        Returns:
        the object itself to allow chaining (not needed though).

      • env

        public DockerfileBuilder env(java.lang.String variableName,
                             java.lang.String value)
        Adds a ENV command to the dockerfile
        Parameters:
        variableName - The name of the environment variable
        value - the corresponding value
        Returns:
        the object itself to allow chaining (not needed though).

      • compressRunCommands

        public DockerfileBuilder compressRunCommands()
        Enables the compression of several run commands to one single run command. This means that they get linked using &&

        Warning: Using this command does not ensure the same behaviour as two separated run commands. (the current directory ist not reset to the current WorkDir)

        Returns:
        the caller

      • write

        public void write()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the dockerfile to the path defined in the constructor
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Builds the dockerfile to a string
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
